high_descs: Look down at the end of the white table with the computer on it.
Pick the basketball up from under the table.
Go left towards the desk with the lamp on it.
anns.task_desc: Turn a lamp on with a basketball in hand.

high_descs: Move to the edge of the table to your right.
Pick up the basketball under the table.
Go to the desk in the opposite corner of the room.
anns.task_desc: Look at the basketball under the lamp light.

high_descs: Turn right and stop at the white table
Grab the basketball that is at the bottom of the table
Turn left and head to the desk
Turn on the lamp that is on the top of the desk
anns.task_desc: Turning on a lamp while holding a basketball
